item.description:
This trip was originally posted for June 22nd, but was postponed due to the weather. Let's hope for some good weather this time around :)

Details:

Wallum Pond is located in Douglas, MA and the pond itself bisects both MA and RI. This pond is a first for me, but Chris recommends it, so giving it a try Sunday. The launch is located off of Wallum Lake Road, we will meet for 2pm and launch shortly thereafter.

For details on the pond, please read the following:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

According to the following web site, there is a fee to park your vehicle. I called and was told the fee is $5 per vehicle. :

http://www.massvacati...


Directions:

(From Worcester) I-395 South to Exit 2 (Rt 16). Follow Rt 16 East until you pass through Douglas State Park. Take a right onto Cedar Street and at the end continue going straight onto Wallum Lake Road. Park entrance will be up ahead on the right.

Alternately, you can also take Rt 146 South to the Lackey Damn Rd exit. Please consult mapquest though for details
item.name: Wallum Pond - Douglas, MA
